sentence: So Mauritius Lux Grand Gaube was a wonderful experience that we would highly recommend to anyone looking for a relaxing or energetic and dancing the night away holiday

All combine to ensure you will have a very relaxing enjoyable and memorable stayI do not like to single out staff for praise as in the case of LG all staff are tremendous and contribute as a team to ensure you have a memorable experience and I thank them all for this but I feel compelled to mention a few who I had like to give a special thanks to Management Brice Stephan who are always visible and take time out to meet greet speak and importantly listen to guests Front office David one of the most helpful people you are ever likely to meet nothing is too much trouble and it is almost like he wants you to ask for something so he can oblige
As a group we all had a fantastic and memorable wedding experience and a holiday thank you to LUX and all their helpful staff
Again we experienced great service from a very dedicated team
We enjoyed a massage in the spa where the atmosphere was very restful
My favourite The Beach managed by Jean Philipe who I now class a friend is a thatched covered raised veranda style restaurant overlooking the bay a very romantic setting
Tranquil and friendly atmosphere
HousekepingRaiken BeachThey made sure our holiday was an unforgettable experience
Location Food Vibe Trendy
It was stunning beautiful setting and tasty Mediterranean dishes with an outstanding service
And we‘ve never experienced so many kind stafmembers in a hotel
Bottom line is that we enjoyed our stay especially our kid but honestly we expected better experience considering the price of the resort
I have truly never had such a wonderful experience at a hotel
I honestly ca n’t find fault and am truly thankful for the memories my husband and I made during our stay
While I ’m writing this with a heavy heart and missing it dearly I look forward to returning one day and making even more memories
I have a bad memory with regards to names
They go above and beyond at every restaurant to make sure you enjoy your experience
If your experience was disappointing tell the hotel before you leave to give them a chance to make up for it
Nothing is too much trouble and it seems that it is within their nature to be able to create such a harmonious atmosphere
There have been several changes of staff but we still knew quite a number and the new staff had clearly had the LUX customer training experience
I had a very great experience with my wife
We did eventually go back and sat at a table in the centre which was a better experience but it is very casual and not somewhere we had want to eat that often in the evening
